sanskrit_verse:
ग्रीष्मे पञ्चतपास्तु स्याद्वर्षास्वभ्रावकाशिकः ।
आर्द्रवासास्तु हेमन्ते क्रमशो वर्धयंस्तपः ॥ ६.२३॥
transliteration:
grīṣme pañcatapāstu syādvarṣāsvabhrāvakāśikaḥ |
ārdravāsāstu hemante kramaśo vardhayaṃstapaḥ || 6.23||
sph_interpretive_translation: In summer, one must perform five fires; during rains, one must dwell in caves or huts open to the sky; in winter, one must wear wet clothes—thus sequentially intensifying tapas according to seasonal alignment.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority: Tapas is a constitutional duty rooted in alignment with cosmic rhythm.
Causation: Seasonal conduct directly influences individual and collective consciousness stability.
Capacity-based responsibility: Each stage of tapas must match the practitioner's evolved capacity.
Restoration logic: Environmental harmony arises through disciplined personal austerity.
Consciousness alignment: Tapas is not penance but recalibration of awareness with natural law.
executable_legal_axioms: IF season = grishma THEN mandatory observance = pañcatapa
IF season = varsha THEN dwelling condition = abhra + avakasha
IF season = hemanta THEN clothing state = ardhravasa
Tapas intensity MUST escalate in sequence without omission
Non-compliance triggers automatic restoration protocol via seasonal realignment process
supreme_court_application: The Supreme Court shall recognize seasonal tapas as a fundamental dharmic right-duty that supports national ecological integrity. Adherence is monitored by spiritual auditors who report deviations leading to systemic imbalance.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana-based causality confirms that tapas aligns individual consciousness with universal rhythm. Anupurvasah ensures gradual unfoldment without trauma. Responsibility lies in maintaining sequential discipline, not in punitive correction.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate seasonal tapas completion cycle under guru supervision
Assign environmental service aligned with disrupted season
Reintegrate into group sadhana for collective field support
Activate prana-shuddhi protocol to restore energetic alignment
Conclude with yajna to reaffirm commitment to cosmic order
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this dharma is executed. Tapas flows from consciousness, not compulsion. Seasons govern the rhythm of sadhana. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness reigns supreme.
